summary: This module contains unit tests for the SimtelIOHistogram utility, including helper functions to instantiate histogram objects and a collection of test cases that check histogram initialization, axis configuration, trigger rate calculations, observation time estimation, solid angle and area computations, particle distribution handling, and proper error handling.
business_intent: Validate the functionality of the SimtelIOHistogram class used in CTA simulation data processing, ensuring accurate extraction and computation of trigger statistics, energy spectra, and related metadata for scientific analysis.
